title: CVC Words: Cat, Dog, and More!
description: Learn to read simple three-letter words with consonant-vowel-consonant patterns.
subject: reading
objectives: Blend sounds together to read CVC words

activities.instructions: CVC words have 3 letters: a consonant, a vowel, and a consonant. Let's read some!
activities.content:
C-A-T says CAT!
D-O-G says DOG!
H-A-T says HAT!

activities.spokenInstructions: Listen to the word and spell it. Cat.
activities.hint: A furry pet that says meow

activities.spokenInstructions: Listen to the word and spell it. Dog.
activities.hint: A pet that barks and wags its tail

activities.spokenInstructions: Listen to the word and spell it. Hat.
activities.hint: You wear it on your head

activities.spokenInstructions: Listen to the word and spell it. Sun.
activities.hint: It shines bright in the sky

activities.spokenInstructions: Listen to the word and spell it. Cup.

activities.instructions: Look at the picture and choose the right word.
activities.question: Which word means a small furry pet that meows?
activities.explanation: A cat is a furry pet that meows! C-A-T spells cat.

activities.question: Which word is something you wear on your head?
activities.explanation: A hat is something you wear on your head! H-A-T spells hat.
